item.title: manymodelr: Build and Tune Several Models
item.description: manymodelr: Build and Tune Several Models In this vignette, we take a look at how we can simplify many machine learning tasks using manymodelr. We will take a look at the core functions first. Installing the package install.packages("manymodelr") Once the package has been successfully installed, we can then proceed by loading the package and exploring some of the key functions. Loading the package library(manymodelr) #> Loading required package: caret #> Loading required package: lattice #> Loading required package: ggplot2 #> Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 4.
